interestingcomments.content: I just disagree with the whole idea of 'glasses+rangefinder=problem' Its not a problem for me, I use varifocals and they are fine with any of my Leica rangefinders. So lets not over egg the pudding and get hysterical, if it is a problem it's a problem for you. Try the options to see which works, one of them will. Steve
